timeline.message:
chore(broker): donot detect streamprocessor as unhealthy when paused

timeline.bodyText: I think it makes more sense sense to calculate the health status here instead of in every caller and passing it as a parameter. An updateHealthStatus method can be called after updating some condition and that knows how to compute the health status. That way the logic isn't spread out.
